                java.io.OutputStream stdout)
         throws PasteException
        Runs the sed application with the specified arguments.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Application
        Parameters:
        args - Array of arguments for the application.
        stdin - An InputStream. The input for the command is read from this InputStream if no files are specified.
        stdout - An OutputStream. The output of the command is written to this OutputStream.
        Throws:
        PasteException

      • mergeStdin

        public java.lang.String mergeStdin(java.io.InputStream stdin)
                            throws PasteException
        Returns string of line-wise concatenated (tab-separated) Stdin arguments. If only one Stdin arg is specified, echo back the Stdin.
        Specified by:

      • mergeFile

        public java.lang.String mergeFile(java.lang.String... fileName)
                           throws PasteException

        Specified by:
        mergeFile in interface PasteInterface
        Parameters:
